start.text: Don't know you. What you want? I'm busy.

weapon_work.text: Yeah I can do that. I'm real good at it. Only guy here who knows how to work metal proper. This place got bad tools but I make it work.

choices.text: What kind of work can you do?
Are you actually good at this?

what_work.text: I hit it with hammer. Make it better. Sometimes it break but that ain't my fault. It's cause everything here is garbage. I do good work.

how_much.text: Costs cigarettes. Good work costs good money. You want cheap go somewhere else. Oh wait there ain't nowhere else.

actually_good.text: Course I'm good. Been doing this long time. I know what I'm doing. Problem is this place. Tools is bad. Metal is bad. Everything bad except me.

it_breaks.text: Yeah sometimes it break. But that ain't cause I'm bad. It's cause this place is cursed or something. Metal don't want to stay fixed here.

doing_wrong.text: I ain't doing nothing wrong. I hit metal. Metal get better. That's how it work. If it don't work then something else is wrong. Not me.

work_on_stuff.text: Yeah I'll work on it. Do real good job. If it break after that ain't my problem.

how_many_cigs.text: Depends what you want. But it's gonna be fair price cause I'm fair guy. Only good blacksmith around here.

thats_stupid.text: Stupid? You stupid. I'm only guy who can fix your stuff. You don't like it go cry somewhere else.

if_you_say.text: I do say. And I'm right. Always right about this stuff.

sounds_excuses.text: Ain't excuses. Is truth. I'm good at this. Everything else around here is garbage.

place_cursed.text: Yeah maybe. Or maybe Gregerson put bad luck on everything. All I know is I do good work and things still break. So it ain't me.

maybe_suck.text: I don't suck. You suck. I'm best blacksmith this place ever had. Probably ever gonna have too.

not_how_works.text: That's exactly how it work. You hit metal. Metal get better. That's blacksmithing. I know cause I'm blacksmith.

whatever_do_it.text: Smart. You know good work when you see it.

anything_sale.text: Got some stuff. Made it myself. Real good quality considering what I got to work with here.

just_looking.text: This is my place. Only real workshop in whole Gregerson. You looking at quality here.
